description.en: A spin-off of Sakigake!! Otokojuku focusing on Date Omito.

The intelligent Hong Danwoo who also is an introvert, has a secret that’s also a problem… He’s unable to get a haircut! But that isn’t the only issue… He’s broke. So, in search of a job, Danwoo finds himself at a small hair salon where he meets a remarkably attractive hairstylist, Kwon Tae-han. A fateful occurrence unfolds when Dan-woo can't help but feel an intense sensation from Tae-Han’s skillful touch while he’s getting his haircut. Unable to hold back his feelings towards the touching, he says,“ Um… When you touch my head, it feels like this…”In the end, Dan-woo decides to confess his little problem with Taehan expecting to receive judgment, Taehan offers to help him instead of thinking he’s some kind of pervert. In order to become a better version of himself, Dan-woo starts up secret training sessions with Taehan. But little does he know, these hidden training sessions become more than just training sessions.
description.es-la: Peluquero Coqueto X Nerd Sensible. ¡Cómo puede ser que la zona erógena de alguien sea su cuero cabelludo/cabello...! Hong Dan-woo es un chico extremadamente introvertida que no tiene ni un solo amigo porque su zona erógena es el cuero cabelludo/cabello. Un día, su jefe a tiempo parcial le dice que se corte el pelo por el bien de su larga melena, ¡así que se arma de valor y va a una peluquería unipersonal a cortarse el pelo...!

altTitles.ja: ダブルヘリクス ブロッサム

description.en: The manga is set in the near future, and begins with the awakening of police officer Kiku Shinonome, who was put into cryogenic stasis for 60 years to stave off what would have been a fatal wound. In a new world unfamiliar to her, she is forced to team up with Kyo Tsukisagari, a criminal with a big rap sheet but equipped with psychic powers. Together, they solve paranormal incidents, even while their personalities butt up against each other.

Is it safe to fall in love with you?
After losing her family to the revolt, noblewoman Lysithea hires Taron, a strapping young broker, to help her flee the kingdom. But when a heavy snowstorm strands the bickering pair in an eerie abandoned mansion, Lysithea has no choice but to rely on her new partner. What dangerous romance awaits them?
description.pl:
Można się w tobie bezpiecznie zakochać?
Po stracie rodziny w wyniku rewolty, szlachcianka Lysithea zatrudnia Tarona, młodego maklera, aby pomógł jej uciec z królestwa. Ale kiedy ciężka burza śnieżna zatrzymuje kłótliwą parę w niesamowitej opuszczonej rezydencji, Lysithea nie ma wyboru i musi polegać na swoim nowym partnerze. Jaki niebezpieczny romans ich czeka?

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!

description.en:
A series of different yandere images by the artist @RinRin200001.

---

**Links:**
- Retail Site - [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/maniax-touch/work/=/product_id/RJ420882.html)

**Notes:**
- From Chapter 134 the author has been publishing a "DereDere version" of the comic on their [FANBOX](https://rinrin83.fanbox.cc/)

”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

altTitles.th: สูตรลับตำรับดันเจียน

description.en:
After his sister is devoured by a dragon and losing all their supplies in a failed dungeon raid, Laios and his party are determined to save his sister before she gets digested. Completely broke and having to resort to eating monsters as food, they meet a dwarf who will introduce them to the world of Dungeon Meshi - delicious cuisine made from ingredients such as the flesh of giant bats, walking mushrooms, or even screaming mandrakes.  
  
---
- **Ranked 1st in the 2016 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! for Male Readers (Shonen/Seinen)**
description.es: Después de que su hermana fuera devorada por un dragón y habiendo perdido todas sus provisiones, Laios y su equipo están decididos a salvar a Farin antes de que sea digerida por la gran bestia. Es así como conocen a un singular enano que los introducirá al mundo gastronómico de las mazmorras: delicias elaboradas a partir de la carne de murciélagos gigantes, hongos caminantes y mandrágoras chillonas.
description.id:
Seorang penjelajah muda, Laios, bersama kawan-kawannya mendapat serangan hebat dari seekor naga jauh di lantai terdalam Dungeon. Mereka kehilangan seluruh uang dan perbekalan, bahkan seorang anggota tim! Walau ingin bergegas kembali dan menyelamatkan rekannya, mereka dihalangi satu masalah besar, “Tanpa makanan dan uang, mereka pasti akan kelaparan di tengah penjelajahan!” Namun, Laios mendapat ide cemerlang, “Kita makan monster saja!”. Slime, kalajengking, basilisk, mandrake, dan kelelawar raksasa… Tidak ada satu monster pun yang luput dari perut-perut keroncongan di Dungeon!! (Gramedia.com) 

[Terjemah Indonesia](https://www.gramedia.com/search?q=delicious%20in%20dungeon)
description.pt-br:
Depois de perder todos os seus suprimentos e provisões e também ter sua irmã devorada por um dragão durante uma expedição na masmorra, Laios e seu grupo estão determinados a salvá-la antes que ela seja completamente digerida pelo dragão.
Mas estando completamente falidos e tendo que recorrer a comer monstros como alimento, eles encontram um anão que os apresentará ao mundo de Dungeon Meshi – uma deliciosa culinária feita com ingredientes como a carne de morcegos gigantes, cogumelos andarilhos e até mesmo mandrágoras.

description.en: In the spring of my third year of middle school, I found Shibata buried beneath a sakura tree. We watched movies and became fast friends, even planned to make a movie together for the school festival...but no one at school seemed to know him. I will discover Shibata and the whole world will turn into Shibata. This is a story of, by, and for Shibata. Now showing in a theater near you.

altTitles.vi: Belle cô lính đánh thuê say xỉn

altTitles.th: ทหารรับจ้างสาวขี้เมา เบล

description.en:
A young traveller, when looking to take on a mercenary as protection against bandits, is forced to go with the cheapest: a young, cheerfully drunken warrior girl, who spends her income mostly on alcohol.
___
**Note**: Chapters “6.7” and “9.10” are Chapters 6 & 7 and 9 & 10 respectively. Chapters 6 and 9 are textless (and therefore have nothing to translate), so they've been put together with the successive chapter to comply with MangaDex rules.

description.ar: في المستقبل البعيد ، يولد شكل جديد من أشكال الحياة يسمى Houseki (الجواهر). يجب على الجواهر الـ 28  القتال ضد القمريين الذين يرغبون في مهاجمتهم وتحويلهم إلى زينة ، وبالتالي يتم تعيين كل جوهرة دور مثل مقاتل أو مسعف. على الرغم من أنهم يأملون في محاربة القمريين ، إلا أن فوس  عبارة عن جوهرة لم يتم منحها أي مهمة حتى يطلب منه المعلم الجواهر كونغو كتابة موسوعة.
description.az: Cəvahiratlar ölkəsi (Houseki no Kuni), meteoritlərin altı dəfə Yerə düşdüyü və bu prosesdə onu məhv etdiyi uzaq gələcəkdə baş verir. Demək olar ki, bütün canlılar məhv oldu, qalan bütün torpaqlar tək bir sahilə çevrildi. Çox uzun zaman dilimləri ərzində həsas həyat forması olan yeni bir irq yarandı; insan şəklini alan ölməz zinət əşyaları. Fosfofillit (Phos) zəifdir (ən aşağı sərtliklərdən birinə malikdir) və həmyaşıdları tərəfindən yararsız hesab edilir. Phos'a təbiət tarixinin ensiklopediyasını yaratmaq tapşırığı verildikdən sonra o, uzaq, lakin müdrik həmkarı Kinovarın (Cinnabar) köməyinə müraciət edir, beləliklə onların dostluğu və şəxsi inkişafı başlayır. Eyni zamanda “Cəvahirat camaatı” onun dəbdəbəli dəyərindən yararlanmaq istəyən Aydan gələnlərlə (aylılarla) müharibə aparır.
description.en: In the distant future, a new life form called The Lustrous are born. The 28 Lustrous must fight against the Lunarians who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each Lustrous is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the Lunarians, Phos is a Lustrous who is given no assignment until the Lustrous' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.
description.uk: У далекому майбутньому народжується нова форма життя, яку називають самоцвітами. 28 самоцвітів повинні боротися проти лунаріанців, які хочуть напасти на них і перетворити на прикраси, тому кожному самоцвіту призначена роль бійця або медика. Фос - одна з самоцвітів, яка сподівається боротися з лунаріанцями, але їй не дають жодних завдань, доки майстер самоцвітів Адамантін не просить її написати енциклопедію.

title.en: The Snake Demon Wants to Flee

description.en: An extreme two-sided war of romance between a flirtatious snake demon that claims to fuck the gods VS a righteous but cold Daoist who only knows how to fight! Due to an unexpected mishap, the Snake Demon King could only bond with the (weird) righteous genius. This story about how the Snake Demon King tries to undo the bonding while trying to figure out how to take back his throne, but loses his body and mind in the process.

title.en: Kanojo no Imouto to Kiss wo Shita❤️

altTitles.ja: カノジョの妹とキスをした。

altTitles.pt-br: Beijei a irmã mais nova da minha namorada ❤️

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanojo no Imouto to Kiss wo Shita❤️

altTitles.en: I Kissed My Girlfriend's Little Sister❤️

description.en:
Hiromichi Satou has been single his whole life, but, he recently got a girlfriend named Saikawa Haruka, and they have been dating for a month. His father remarries, and he gets a new step-sister Saikawa Shigure, the identical twin of Haruka.

Sato and Shigure agree to keep their step-sibling relationship a secret from everyone, and Haruka. How will the story unfold?
description.ja:
**恋人そっくりの小悪魔系女子とひとつ屋根の下で暮らすことに！？**

俺が人生で初めての恋人・晴香と、交際一ヵ月にしてやっと手を繋げた日、親が再婚した。
父から同い年の義妹ができると聞かされ驚いたのもつかの間、その義妹は恋人と瓜二つで──！？

淡い初恋に忍び込む甘い猛毒あいじょう。
奥手な恋人にはとても教えられない、小悪魔で甘えん坊な義妹との甘々“不”純愛ラブコメ──開幕！！
description.pt-br: Hiromichi Satou está namorando Haruka há um mês, e o relacionamento deles está se fortalecendo. No entanto, um dia, o pai de Hiromichi informa que ele se casou novamente e Hiromichi terá uma nova meia-irmã. Quando ele finalmente a conhece, fica chocado ao ver que ela é idêntica à sua namorada Haruka. O que acontecerá agora que Hiromichi se encontra com a cara de sua namorada em sua nova meia-irmã?!

title.en: The Strongest and Fastest Unlimited Level Up: With the Skills [1000x Exp] and [Level Free], I Broke the Upper Level Limit and Rose to the Top!

altTitles.ja: 最強で最速の無限レベルアップ　～スキル【経験値１０００倍】と【レベルフリー】でレベル上限の枷が外れた俺は無双する～

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou de Saisoku no Mugen Level Up
Saikyō de Saisoku no Mugen Level Up ~ Sukiru [Keiken-chi 1000-bai] to [Level Free] de Level Jōgen no Kase ga Hazureta Ore wa Musō Suru ~

description.en:
Makoto Sakura, sixteen years old, finds himself without a place after dropping out of high school. Suddenly, an otherworldly relic appears before him. On that day, dungeons began to appear all over the world. Humans acquired a level system that completely overturned their previous values. Amidst this revolution, Makoto finds his place inside the dungeons.

Acquiring cheat skills like “Experience Points x1000” and “Level Free,” he becomes a level 10,000 powerhouse. As the strongest “Player,” he embarks on dungeon exploration!

Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.

title.en: Shoukan sareta Kenja wa Isekai wo Yuku ~Saikyou nano wa Fuyou Zaiko no Item deshita~

altTitles.ja: 召喚された賢者は異世界を往く ～最強なのは不要在庫のアイテムでした～

altTitles.en: A Sage Is Summoned to Another World: The Undesired Items Are Now the Strongest

altTitles.es-la: El sabio es invocado a otro mundo ~Los artículos más fuertes eran los menos deseados del inventario~

altTitles.ko: 소환된 현자는 이세계를 누빈다 ~최강인 것은 필요없는 재고 아이템이었습니다~

altTitles.zh-hk: 被召喚的賢者前往異世界～廢棄庫存道具才是最強～

altTitles.zh: 被召唤的贤者前往异世界～废弃库存道具才是最强～

description.en:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
description.es-la:
Touya, el jugador mas fuerte del juego Pandemic World Online, ha ganado tantos items que decidió crear una cuenta alternativa para almacenarlos, mientras jugaba fue invocado a otro mundo, pero al no tener la categoría de héroe es desechado y remplazado por otra persona, ahora tendrá que sobrevivir solo en ese mundo y con el personaje que creó para almacenar esos objetos.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9275ei/) (Japanese)

altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa: Road to 2002 - Go for 2006

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ROAD　TO　2002

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

title.en: No Way I'll Go into the Cornfield With You!

description.en:
Jiang Lieyang, a spoiled rich kid  who was born in the Jiangnan region, was deceived by his own mother and sent to the Dongbei countryside. Where the mysterious local resident Xun Zao became Jiang Lieyang’s “acting guardian”

Not being used to the living habits and the difference in local customs make the pampered Jiang Lieyang want to escape, but he couldn't help but getting closer and closer to Xun Zao...

title.en: The Fragrant Flower Blooms With Dignity

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku

altTitles.th: ดอกรักผลิบานที่กลางใจ

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaoru Hana Wa Rin To Saku

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

description.en: During a rainy evening, is the start of the story between Myrtis and Dennis. Starting from a lie, and by creating more and more lies, Myrtis finally be able to be with Dennis's side. But how long will this situation going on?

title.en: The Baby Dragon and the Rabbit Spirit

description.en:
Rabbit spirit, Bi-yeon, who has nothing to do except take care of rabbits, picks up a cute little dragon that was badly injured one day.
From that day onwards, he starts dreaming of his past life.

Among the divine beasts, the rabbit spirit 'Biyeon' is on the lowest level.
Although he is the highest level of divine beast, 'Do-ryu' was born with a prophecy that he would destroy the country.
Their meeting, disguised as chance, and his other self from his previous life, start opening his eyes to new things.

-

title.en: Love Live! flowers* - Hasunosora Girls' High School Idol Club -

title.en: A Beast Tamed by the Villainess

altTitles.en: The Beast Tamed by the Villainess
The Beast Tamed by the Evil Woman

altTitles.fr: La bête apprivoisée par la vilaine

altTitles.es: Una bestia domesticada por la villana

altTitles.ar: الوحش المروض من قبل المرأة الشريرة

description.ar:
ا عندما يخرج الشرير الحقيقي الوحيد في الرواية أخذ رجلًا جميلًا وتم ترويضه لبقية حياته. بعد أن دفع مخاوفه إلى أقصى حد ، تعلم كيف يتوسل منها ، ليصبح وحشًا لا يمكنه الهروب أبدًا ، حتى لو تم فك رباطه. ومع ذلك ، يقع الوحش في حب المرأة التي تنقذه ، ويصبح الإمبراطور بجانبه ، ويعاقب الشرير بالقيود الأبدية. بعد القصة ، استولت على جسد الشرير في ذلك الوقت عندما كانت في منتصف الطريق لترويض الرجل الرئيسي. ……ماذا علي أن أفعل؟ أولا ، دعونا نتراجع عن غسيل المخ شيئا فشيئا. وبعد ذلك ... دعونا نتظاهر بأننا قد تبنا. "لقد مررت بالكثير من المتاعب في البحث عنك." "أنا ... لا أفهم تمامًا ما تقصده يا جلالة الملك." "كيف أنسى لمستك؟" أمسك بمعصمي ، وأمسك بيدي وحركها برفق على خده - تمامًا مثلما فعلت إليانا ، الشريرة في الرواية ، دائمًا عندما تمدحه. "سأروّضك ، مثلما فعلت - وحشًا لا يمكنه فعل أي شيء بدوني." غطت كفي على خده ثم شفتيه. وضع عليها قبلة قصيرة قبل أن يسحب يدي ببطء

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53753133), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6288269), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2901002360)

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/content/59641167)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-villainess-tames-the-beast/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26294&contentId=294&platform=IA)
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/la-bete-apprivoisee-par-la-vilaine/list?title_no=4873)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Villainess-Tames-the-Beast/605)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112576)
description.en:
The only real villain in the novel, took a handsome man and tamed him for the rest of his life. After putting his fear to the limit, he learned to plead with her, becoming a beast from which he could never escape even if he loosened his leash. However, one day, the beast falls in love and becomes emperor with the woman who saved him, and plunges the evil woman into an eternal bondage.

---
I've posessed the body of the sociopathic villainess, Illyana! An evil villainess who picks up a boy named Magnus and raises him however she pleases... that Illyana is me?!

"I am going to tame you into a beast that cannot do anything without me. Just as you had done to me."

And after 2 years, he who had become an emperor began his revenge. Excuse me, author! Illyana was the sinner but why must I suffer his vengeance? I was just a normal reader named Yuna!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53753133), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6288269), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2901002360)

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/content/59641167)

**Official Translations:**

description.fa:
تنها شرور واقعی رمان، مرد خوش تیپی را گرفت و تا آخر عمر اهلی خودش کرد. بعد از اینکه ترسش را نسبت به خودش زیاد کرد، مرد یاد گرفت که از او التماس کند و تبدیل به حیوانی شد که حتی اگر افسارش را شل کند هرگز نمی توانست از او فرار کند. با این حال، یک روز، حیوان عاشق می شود و با زنی که او را نجات داد، امپراتور می شود و زن شرور را در اسارتی ابدی فرو می برد.

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53753133), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6288269), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2901002360)

description.fr:
Iliana, la maléfique méchante d'un roman recueille un beau garçon qu'elle dompte comme une bête. À l'aide de drogues et de lavage de cerveau, L'homme laisse peu à peu place à la bête jusqu'à ce que l'héroïne le sauve. La bête deviendra l'empereur du pays et punira la méchante pour l'éternité. C'est une histoire qui aurait pu m'amuser si je n'avais pas été transportée dans le corps de la méchante au beau milieu du roman. Que faire de cette bête rampant à mes pieds? Comment échapper à la terrible fin qui m'attend?

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53753133), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6288269), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2901002360)

description.ru:
Однажды злодейка по имени Иллиана подбирает прекрасного юношу и с помощью внушения делает из него своего домашнего питомца. Девушка ввергает зверя в пучину отчаяния, изводя его бесконечными ночными кошмарами, и в итоге он становится полностью зависим от нее.

---

description.tr:
Cani kadın İllyana oldum! Magnus adındaki bir çocuğu yanına alıp onu istediği gibi yetiştiren kötü kadın İllyana… Ben İllyana oldum öyle mi?!
“Seni, ‘bensiz bir hiç olan canavar’ olarak evcilleştireceğim. Tıpkı senin bana yaptığın gibi.”
Ve 2 yıl sonra imparator olup intikamını almaya başladı. Pardon, yazar! İllyana günahkardı ama neden onun intikamını almak zorundayım? Ben sadece Yuna adında normal bir okuyucuydum!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53753133), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6288269), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2901002360)

description.uk:
Єдина справжня лиходійка у романі взяла красеня і приборкала його назавжди. 
Дійшовши межі та ставши звіром, він навчився благати її. Від сутності його неможливо втекти навіть якщо розірвати повідець. Та це триває тільки доти, поки він не стає імператором, закохується в рятівницю та занурює лиходійку у вічне рабство. 
Я потрапила у ту частину, де головний герой ще не приборканий повністю. 
Що робити? Спочатку приборкати його повністю, а потім покаятись? 
«Це важко забути».
«Що ви маєте на увазі… Я не знаю, Ваша Величносте Імператор».
«Як я можу забути цей твій дотик?»
Він схопив мене за руку, підніс її до щоки й обережно потерся.
Так само, як завжди робила лиходійка у романі, коли хвалила його.
«Я приборкаю тебе. Як ти зробила зі мною, звіром, який без тебе нічого не може зробити».
Долоня, що так ненавмисно торкнулася його щоки, досягла губ. Він коротко поцілував долоню, потім повільно прибрав руку...

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53753133), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6288269), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2901002360)

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/content/59641167)

altTitles.en: The Stain of the Trapped Beast

description.en: Once a prince of a fallen nation, but due to the defeat in war, he could only be reduced as a prisoner and become plaything for the powerful people of the victorious nation. Xing Mu, who endured the humiliation and disguised himself as an Omega, was on a mission of revenge and restoration of his homeland. However, his biggest obstacle was the helpless second prince of the enemy nation — a beautiful omega who was marked by him in an accident. Therefore, the love and hate between the two, accompanied by the dark surge of revenge, tightly entangled together...
description.pl: Kiedyś należał do rodziny królewskiej, lecz jego kraj poniósł solidną porażkę. Mógł tylko zostać jeńcem dla potężnych ludzi zwycięskiego kraju, aby mogli się zabawić jego kosztem. Xing Mu, mimo iż czuł upokorzenie, przebrał się za Omegę, by móc się zemścić i odbudować swój kraj. Jednakże... Najważniejszą przeszkodą, jaką musiał pokonać, był drugi książę wroga, Hill, którego przez przypadek oznaczył, czyniąc z niego jego Omegę. W tym momencie miłość i nienawiść między dwojgiem ludzi są ściśle splecione z nurtem zemsty....

description.en: Miza Yuuji is the so-called "beautiful priest" of Uguisuzaka Shopping District, loved and respected by all not only for his skills as a Buddhist priest but for his demure demeanor and kind air. While he professes to have pledged himself to the cloth, vowing to remain unmarried and celibate for life… he's harbored a crush on his best friend Saburou since middle school. Now that Saburou's back in town, taking over his parents' tofu shop after an eight-year absence, Yuuji must deal with feelings he thought he'd long since moved past – and that's when he gets drunk one evening in Saburou's presence.

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

title.en: Tensei Shite Inaka de Slowlife wo Okuritai

altTitles.en: I want a slow life in the countryside after reincarnation
I want to enjoy slow living

altTitles.ja: 転生して田舎でスローライフをおくりたい

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生之後我想要在田園過慢生活

altTitles.ru: После перерождения я хочу жить спокойной жизнью в деревне

altTitles.zh: 转生之后我想要在田园过慢生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei shite Inaka de Slow Life wo Okuritai

description.en:
The protagonist, Inaka Yuuji, was ran over by a truck because his awareness was dulled from overworking.  
  
“Ahー, with this I don’t have to work so much anymore. I want to spend my next life leisurely……” was the wish Yuuji blurted out, He met God and it was decided he will be reincarnated in the countryside of the other world. He became Alfred Slowlet, 2nd son of a countryside noble, will he be able to enjoy and leisurely spend his slow life in the countryside?

title.en: Monmusugo! ~Honnyaku Skill de Saikyou Monmusume to Isekai Seikatsu~

altTitles.ja: モンむすご！〜翻訳スキルで最強モン娘と異世界生活〜

altTitles.en: Monmusugo!: Living in Another World with the Strongest Monster Girls with Translation Skills

description.en: Amakawa Keisuke, a hapless corporate slave who suddenly dies, wakes up in a different world! He tries his best to enjoy life in another world, but he has only been given the bottom-tier skill "Translation" and on top of that, the most powerful monster was in front of him...!
description.ja: 突然死した社畜サラリーマン・天川慶介が目を覚ますとそこは異世界！　異世界ライフを謳歌しようと頑張るが、ゴミスキル「翻訳」しか授かってなかった上に、目の前には最強のモンスターが…!?

description.en: Haruto Ichinose has an older brother, Shori Ichinose, who has excellent grades, is a basketball prodigy, and is very popular in school. Although he says he hates basketball, he trains alone and challenges his brother, only to be beaten back. On the other hand, his older brother Shori seems to recognize his "talent" more than anyone else, but who is he really...?
description.ja: 成績優秀、バスケは天才的、そして校内の人気者・一ノ瀬翔麗を兄に持つ一ノ瀬陽斗。バスケは大嫌いと言いつつ、一人特訓して兄に挑戦しては返り討ちに遭う日々。一方で兄・翔麗は誰よりも陽斗の「才能」を認めている様子だが、その正体は…!?
description.pt-br: Haruto Ichinose tem um irmão mais velho, Shori Ichinose, que tem notas excelentes, é um prodígio do basquete e é muito popular na escola. Embora Haruto diga que odeia basquete, ele treina sozinho e desafia seu irmão, apenas para ser derrotado. Por outro lado, seu irmão mais velho Shori parece reconhecer seu "talento" mais do que qualquer outra pessoa, mas quem ele realmente é...?

description.en: Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

description.en: Fujiyama Shinobu aka Sexy Fujiyama, is a general working for the evil Flower Bud Gang who are trying to take over the city. Standing in her way is the masked magical girl, Princess Mamu, who wouldn't you know it, has just moved in next door to Fujiyama's place...

title.en: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game

altTitles.en: Haibara-kun's Strong and Youthful New Game

altTitles.ja: 灰原くんの強くて青春ニューゲーム

altTitles.ja-ro: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game

description.en:
Natsuki Haihara is a young man who failed to make his high school debut and is now in his fourth year of college following a terrible high school life. He was about to enter the workforce when he was unexpectedly whisked back in time seven years to just before he started high school!

Natsuki is given the opportunity to “redo” his regret-filled high school life, and he uses his prior experiences to successfully become a member of a group of six beautiful boys and girls at the top of the class caste!

What’s more, the beautiful girl he once had a crush on, Hikari, was also there…?!

The unconscious high-spec young man starts his second adolescence all over again in real life, a strong, new game school romantic comedy!
description.ja:
大人気作品『灰原くんの強くて青春ニューゲーム』のコミカライズ連載スタート！

高校デビューに失敗し、灰色の高校時代を経て大学４年となった青年・灰原夏希。社会人目前だった彼はある日突然、７年前――高校入学直前まで時を遡っていた!!
後悔しかなかった高校生活の「やり直し」の機会を得た夏希は、過去の経験を活かして見事クラスカースト最上位な美男美女６人グループの一員となることに成功！
しかもそこにはかつて片思いしていた美少女・陽花里の姿もあって……!?
無自覚ハイスペック青年が２度目の青春をリアルにやり直す、強くてニューゲーム学園ラブコメ！

description.en: I am 30 years old, jobless and in despair, when I was invited to become a "Girls Bar Manager." So I entered the world of urban nightlife, and what awaited me was a very cute cast of girls. However, the owner had an ironclad rule for me: "Never touch any of the bar girls." I wonder if I will be able to stick to the rule...... This adult-themed romantic comedy takes place in a girls bar, a place of relaxation for gentlemen!

title.en: Tanbo de Hirotta Onna Kishi, Inaka de Ore no Yome da to Omowareteiru

altTitles.ja: 田んぼで拾った女騎士、田舎で俺の嫁だと思われている

altTitles.en: All My Neighbors are Convinced the Female Knight from My Rice Field is My Wife
I Found a Female Knight in a Rice Field, in the Countryside They Think She’s My Wife

altTitles.th: เพราะดันไปเก็บตกอัศวินหญิงจากท้องนา แถวบ้านเลยลือว่านางเป็นภรรยาของผม ตอนที่
เก็บอัศวินหญิงได้จากท้องนา ตอนที่

description.en:
Jin Mita, a farmer living in a small countryside town, discovers an unconscious female knight in his rice field one morning. She calls herself Seraphim, and she seems to have come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and nowhere to go. Unable to bear seeing her like this, Jin offered to take her in, but apparently the people around him think that Seraphim is his wife...!?

A slow life in the countryside begins with a beautiful female knight!

(Source: Magazine Pocket)

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10528/episode/349125) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 小さな田舎町で農家として暮らす三田仁は、ある朝自分の田んぼに女騎士が倒れているのを発見する。セラフィムと名乗る彼女は、どうやら異世界からやって来たらしい。この世界の知識もなく行き場もない。そんな彼女を見かねて一緒に暮らすことを提案するも、どうやら周りからはセラフィムが俺の嫁だと思われてるようで…!? お日様の下の農作業と新鮮素材のお料理。そして美人女騎士と送る、のんびり田舎スローライフ開幕！
description.vi: Một ngày nọ, tôi ra thăm ruộng, thì vô tình gặp một nữ hiệp sĩ đang nằm trong bãi ruộng nhà tôi. Cô ta tự xưng là Seraphim, là kị sĩ tới từ một đế quốc viễn tưởng nào đó. Có vẻ như cô ấy nói thật, vì cô ta không có bất cứ kiến thức gì về thế giới này. Do không thể để mặc cô ấy như vậy, tôi đành đưa cô ấy về nhà chăm sóc. Và do ở vùng quê người ta biết hết dù chỉ là một sự thay đổi nhỏ nhất, người ta bắt đầu đồn cô ấy là vợ tôi...

description.en:
Chika Suzugamori, a rookie manga artist, has been getting rejected every time she submits a new draft.

On the verge of giving up, she suddenly gets the idea of going on a journey-

A journey that heals precisely because it's rough - the ultimate travel comic!
description.ja:
ここではない、どこか。そこに私が待っている——。

新人漫画家の鈴ヶ森ちかは、ネームを持ち込む度に全ボツを食らっていた。
心が折れかけた彼女だが、唐突に旅に出ることを思い立ち——。
ざつな旅だからこそ癒やされる、究極旅コミック！
description.es-la:
Chika Suzugamori, una artista de manga novata, ha sido rechazada cada vez que presenta un nuevo borrador. 

A punto de rendirse, de repente se le ocurre la idea de emprender un viaje... 
Un viaje que se cura precisamente porque es duro: ¡el cómic de viajes definitivo!

title.en: The Tyrant Wants to Live a Virtuous Life

altTitles.en: The Tyrant Wants to Live Honestly
The Tyrant Wants to Live a Good Life

altTitles.es: La tirana quiere tener una buena vida

altTitles.id: Sang Tiran ingin hidup dengan jujur

altTitles.en: The Tyrant Wants to Be Good

description.en:
Dorothea Milanaire, who was once the tyrant of the Ubera Empire, wound up being hated by the one she loved and was executed. However... after she opened her eyes, she found herself back in her childhood?! Believing this to be her chance, she resolved to live virtuously in this life. Can she repent her past life as a tyrant and live virtuously in her new life...?!

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5469718), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8605301)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9013022), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801736)
description.ko:
폭군님은 갱생 중! 

제국 우베라의 폭군이었던 도로테아 밀라네어. 

눈앞의 모든 것을 제거하며, 빼앗고 탐욕스럽게 먹어 치우는 '악'이었던 그녀는 
결국 사랑하는 사람에게 미움받고 처형을 당하고 만다. 

그런데... 눈을 뜨니 어린 시절로 되돌아왔다?!  

혹시 이건 악과 후회로 얼룩진 인생을 되돌릴 수 있는 기회가 아닐까? 

이번 생의 목표는 착하게 사는 것. 
과연 도로테아는 폭군이었던 과거를 청산하고 새로운 삶에서 착하게 살아갈 수 있을까...?! 

폭군님의 인생을 건 갱생이 시작된다!

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5469718), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8605301)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9013022), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801736)
description.uk:
Доротея Міланір - тиранка імперії Убера, яка була ненависна тому, кого кохала, хоча все своє існування відчайдушно прохала про взаємну любов. Однак... Розплющивши очі, героїня розуміє, що повернулася в дитинство. "Здається, це мій шанс!". Вона ставить собі за мету прожити гідне життя. Чи вдасться їй позбутися своєї минулої тиранічної суті та нарешті жити щасливо?

---
**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5469718), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8605301)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9013022), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801736)

description.en: Lu Wang Xin is the young miss of Yun Jian Mountain Villa. She fell in love with Xia Hou You. However, after Xia Hou You ascended the throne, he put Lu Wang Xin into the Cold Palace. Heartbroken, Lu Wang Xin died. Reborn at age 16, Lu Wang Xin embarked on the road of revenge…

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

description.en: The game has emerged into reality, the rules of the world have been turned upside down and humanity has entered the era of becoming players with the world set as a game stage. The only way to become a player is by leveling up to become stronger! The only way to rise to the top of the world! On the day of world fusion Lin Moyue chose to take on the sole hidden class, Necromancer. From then on, Lin Moyue would not die until his summoned creatures died out. “I sit on the throne of bones as the God of the dead and walk between life and death.” “I am a walking catastrophe!”
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

description.en:
J is a lone assassin feared as "untouchable" in the underworld.
Megumi is a lonely girl who has no place at home or school.
When the two meet, an unexpected story begins.
description.uk: Джей - самотній найманий вбивця, якого у злочинному світі вважають "невразливим". Меґумі - самотня дівчинка, якій немає місця ні вдома, ні в школі. Коли вони познайомилися, розпочалася несподівана історія, Джей та Меґумі обмінялися тілами. Тепер, Джей змушений взятися за завдання по вбивству у своєму новому тілі.

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

title.en: Hazukashigariya no Tsuma to Shinkon Seikatsu Hajimemashita

altTitles.ja: 恥ずかしがり屋の妻と新婚生活はじめました

altTitles.zh: 容易害羞的妻子与新婚生活的开始

altTitles.en: Starting My Married Life with My Shy Wife

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazukashigariya no Tsuma to Shinkon Seikatsu Hajimemashita

description.en:
Eat lunch at the convenience store, go home, take a bath, sleep. This was how I lived my life, but that ends today! My cute wife is now... wait why's she so distant?!

A comedic glimpse in the exciting newlywed life with a very shy but cute wife.
description.ja:
今までは帰りにコンビニで弁当買って帰って食べて風呂入って寝るだけの毎日だったけど……でも今は違う。
僕にはかわいい妻が――って距離遠っ！？
ちょっと（？）恥ずかしがり屋だけど最高にかわいい妻とのドキドキ新婚生活コメディ♪

altTitles.ja: アンネームドメモリー

description.en:
“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”  
  
As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - Admire Vega is Suki (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: アドマイヤベガ Is SUKI

description.en:
A series of short Umamusume comics made by [@k0koro_091](https://twitter.com/k0koro_091), mostly featuring Admire Vega and her relationship with her assigned trainer.
[Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2053756)
[DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/dlaf/=/t/n/link/work/aid/hisubway/id/RJ01085548.html)

altTitles.ja: ベイブレードエックス

description.en: Beyblade pros from around the world gather to compete in the Pro League held inside the X Tower!

A new school year is one where everyone is excited to make new friends. Meanwhile, self-appointed loner Nam Sumin plans to not talk to anyone and lie low. However, contrary to his earnest wishes, he ends up in the same class and roommates with Lee Jaeha, the epitome of a social butterfly… 

Talk about a dreadful connection…!
A squad of soldiers receive a distress signal from an abandoned mining facility where they soon have to face dangerous creatures in a battle of survival.

Higan:Eruthyll: On the Eruthyll planet, humans obtained unique crystal veins called Dubriostal, based on which they developed brilliant magic tech. Feeling blessed by Dubriostal, people start to worship and deify Dubriostal, thus resulting in the emergence of Crystalis Conflux. Steeped in Crystalis Conflux's propaganda, people discriminate against those who cannot resonate with the Dubriostal, branding them as Castaway and claiming their souls are incomplete. Crystalis Conflux secretly devised an evil plan; only Castaways can see through their lies. To fight against the Crystalis Conflux and save the world, Castaways formed their resistance group - Gopher Troupe. This manga elaborates on the founding of Gopher Troupe and Castaways' glorious path of struggle.

Hands. It is one of the most complex organs in the human body, with a particularly complex function and structure. Therefore, there is a doctor who specializes in this organ: <Hand Surgeon>. Isshin Tezuka is a hand surgeon at Ohrando Hospital. He has an aloof appearance and is full of mystery, but the only thing that is certain about him is that he is an extremely talented hand surgeon. This is a life story woven by his hands and the many hands he heals. An authentic medical drama for the new era!
description.ja:
その日、病院に運び込まれた男性は、事故で右腕が切断されていた。絶望する男性の息子に救急スタッフが告げる。「再接着手術を行います――」「くっつくんですか…父の右腕が!?」不可能を可能にするのは【手専門の医者】。

【手外科医】手塚一心。

description.en: Vampires, the closest beings to demi-gods, are living in harmony with human civilization. Edward (nickname: Eddie), a vampire with weak supernatural powers, approaches Joshua, a nerdy and easy-looking prey. Eddie’s expectations are sky-high as he watches Joshua obediently follow after him, but there seems to be a misunderstanding about Eddie sucking WHAT?!
